recipesJson.name: Double Apple Guava
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
This recipe works really well in your mtl tanks/rdas and pod style devices. It's got a lot of that punchy guava flavor and it's defiantly something that you can use all day.

Sweeten to taste.

Watch the Video here: 
https://youtu.be/q1GRTiy8wM4
